p: Most of the studies are on biscuits, however, the addition of Moringa oleifera can be found in meats, juices and yoghurts among others. The addition of Moringa oleifera in the food industry represents a great contribution to the nutritional value of products, which can be an interesting strategy that aims to improve the nutritional status and health of people, especially in places of extreme poverty or food scarcity. Moreover, it is an attractive factor for those who like to eat healthy and that a food product is more than just taste and meaning.
